### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position (10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position (10.5, 10.5)), boiler (position (-6.0, 24.5)), and offshore pump (position (-9.5, 24.5))

### Iron ore mine at position (43.0, -84.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (43.0, -84.0)) and a furnace at position (45.0, -83.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a chest at position (-16.5, -49.5)
-  Furnace (position (40.0, -82.0))
-  Furnace (position (42.0, -81.0))
-  Furnace (position (45.0, -80.0))
-  Furnace (position (40.0, -79.0))

### Iron plate factory
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position (40.0, -82.0))
-  Furnace (position (45.0, -83.0))
-  Furnace (position (42.0, -81.0))
-  Furnace (position (45.0, -80.0))
-  Furnace (position (40.0, -79.0))

### Lab at position (unknown)
Consists of lab (status EntityStatus.NO_RESEARCH_IN_PROGRESS, electrical_id=45707)

### Inserter system at position (3.5, 0.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position (3.5, 0.5)) and a chest at position (2.5, 0.5)

### Inserter system at position (0.5, 3.5)
Consists of burner inserter (position (0.5, 3.5)) and a chest at position (0.5, 2.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into entities
-  Ensure the entity has enough space to accept the items before inserting
-  Make sure the entity is not full before attempting to insert items

### Errors when extracting items from entities
-  Ensure the entity contains the items you are trying to extract before extracting
-  Make sure the entity is not empty before attempting to extract items

### Errors when using burner mining drills
-  Ensure the drill has enough fuel to operate before starting the drill
-  Make sure the chest at the drop position is not full before the drill starts mining

### Errors when placing entities
-  Ensure the tile is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place
-  Make sure the entity can be placed at the specified position before attempting to place

### Errors when using furnaces
-  Ensure the furnace has enough fuel to operate before starting the furnace
-  Make sure the furnace source is not full before the furnace starts smelting

### Errors when using boilers
-  Ensure the boiler has enough fuel to operate before starting the boiler
-  Make sure the boiler has enough water to operate before starting the boiler
